author: wvalthar
title: @chain-lib WordPress Plugin
description: It should be easy for anyone to create a Cardano web3 compatible website, regardless of their technical expertise.
solution: Port current @chain-lib web components over to wordpress.
experience: Novella / Cardano Keys Developer, SPO, Alanzo Purple tester, Plutus Pioneer 1, and already built several components inside the github repo.
